snippet: The shooting deaths of the 45-year-old father and his 18-year-old son took place amid an uprising in which 13 Israelis and at least 85 Palestinians have lost their lives.
abstract: Israeli father and son are killed in drive-by shooting near Israeli settlement of Otniel in West Bank; shooting leaves five other members of family wounded.
lead_paragraph: The shooting deaths of the 45-year-old father and his 18-year-old son took place amid an uprising in which 13 Israelis and at least 85 Palestinians have lost their lives.

headline.main: Israeli Family Attacked in West Bank, and 2 Are Killed
headline.print_headline: 2 Killed as Israeli Family Is Attacked in West Bank
